Запечатанный барьер разрушен
Вы удивлены. Но не вы ли прошли чрез наши врата в поисках крови?
Сюда, дети рассвета. Бессмертный господин изопьёт из ваших душ!
Маленькие ключи
Найдите кровавый пергамент
Найдите зелёный ключ

Гильдхест выполнен! Заберите свою награду.
Устраните все цели.
Сразите <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>.
Поймайте <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>.
Сопроводите <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var> до указанной локации.
Прекрасное зрелище! А теперь, заберите свою награду.
Мы закончили? Тогда несите свои задницы сюда чтобы мы как можно быстрее ушли из этого ужасного места!
Достаточно. Возвращайтесь ко мне, авантюристы.
А у тебя талант, не так ли? Как будто я смотрю на себя молодого!
Одолейте по одной группе врагов за раз.
Если <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> заметит тебя, он отдаст приказ на атаку всем остальным. Избегайте его поле зрения и разбирайтесь по одному миньону за раз.
Если <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> заметит тебя, он отдаст приказ на атаку всем остальным. Избегайте его поле зрения и разбирайтесь по одному миньону за раз.
Не гони коней! Только самоубийца нападет сразу на обе группы!
Don't be so bloody eager to march headlong into peril! Try luring the beasts away from the goobbue without alarming the mossy lout.
Executed to perfection! Now put the seedkin down!
The goobbue has seen you and alerted his scrags! Slay as many as you can before jumpin' in bed with the giant, or you won't survive another bell!
Get up! You won't do your allies any good lying sprawled across the grass like a beached whale!
What in the seven hells are you fools doing!? Fall back and regroup!
Might be I was mistaken about you all. I'd say your chances of victory are a notch above dismal.
You've come this far, now finish him!
When threatened, <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> will summon reinforcements. Stay alert!
Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.
Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.
The stronger of your allies would be wise to draw the enemy's attention away from the weaker.
Those allies specialized in dealing damage will find their attacks more effective when dealt from the enemy's flank or rear.
Reinforcements! Move to intercept!
Another wave! But unlike the last!
Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var> to open the first gate.
Defeat the enemies and use the lever to open the gate.
Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> before the yarzons break free.
Behind you! Slay the lesser enemies before concentrating your efforts on the true threat.
Pull the lever and open the gate!
Quickly! Those boulders will not hold the yarzons back for long!
There to the left of the gate! A second swarm of yarzons has appeared! Hurry and fell the gigantoad or you will have the vilekin to deal with, as well.
A swarm of yarzons has broken through! Your attention is best focused on clearing away the six-legged vilekin before returning to the gigantoad.
A second swarm approaches quickly! Ready yourselves!
A superb display of strength and speed! Well done!
The boulders are beginning to crack!
The boulders will crumble at any moment, allowing the yarzons entry!
Now pull the lever to open the gate...but only when you are ready for what waits on the other side.
My orders are to aid you to victory. You only make it harder on yourselves by disregarding them.
Now that those two are out of the way, concentrate your efforts on the hog.
Something tells me there will be more if you cannot make swift work of that toad.
The first gate is open! Tend to your wounds before advancing to the second.
The second gate is open! One more, and you will have breached the gigantoad's lair.
The third gate has fallen! The lord of the lair awaits beyond!
The safety mechanism on the gate will deactivate once all threats in the area have been removed.
<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var>)) /var> will attempt to heal <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8030202 /var>.
Use fire sprite cores to light the herb patch and release slumber-inducing smoke into the air.
Your orders are to capture the gil turtle. The best manner in which to accomplish this task is by first weakening the poor creature.

The craven bandits who spirited away the turtle would not have you reclaim their prize, and will heal the creature's wounds with hopes that their efforts will discourage you into leaving. Draw the turtle away from the conjurers.
In its current weakened state, the gil turtle will be unable to resist the effects of the herbs. Now quickly! We require fire sprite cores!
Use the core to light the herb patch lying before me.
The herbs are aflame! Now do what you must to draw the gil turtle into the smoke!
And so the gentle giant succumbs to slumber's blissful embrace. Our work here is complete.
Those efts may prove troublesome if left alone. Slay the wavekin before the situation becomes problematic.
Out of cores? Well then claim new ones! You'd think that much was obvious!
Stay your blades! The client specifically stated that he wished his pet returned alive!
You blundering half-wits! Now what are we to tell Lord Adeledji!
The smoke will have little effect on the turtle while in his current condition.
Releasing the smoke now would be useless. I shall tend to the herbs while you see to the gil turtle.
Fire sprite cores
Silence those bandits!
Lure enemies away from the ruptured pollen clusters before engaging them.
Stay clear of the ruptured pollen clusters when engaging enemies.
If inhaled the pollen will set fire to your lungs and sap your strength. Draw the creatures a safe distance from the noisome mist and then engage.
Do not let down your guard. The battle has only just begun.
It may take some coercing to draw that one from the mist.
Leave the mist at once! You will need all your strength to defeat these horrors of the wood!
Maneuver clear of the raining pollen clusters lest you find yourself caught in their mist!
The wind! It carries away the mist! The Matron smiles upon us!
The mist, it returns!
The creature has left the pollen mist! Now is your chance! Strike it down!
Your foe weakens with every blow you land! Do not let up!
Yes! I do believe you have him! It won't be much longer now!
Defeat the roaming bandits before engaging the stationary targets.
Beware of reinforcements.
Prevent the conjurers from healing their wounded companions.
Redbellies! To me!
My wounds! Someone see to my wounds!
Where are all my men!?
Ware the scouts, for they will alert their brethren of your presence.
The swarmpoint has summoned reinforcements! Locate them immediately!
Their conjurers will spell your end. Silence the casters so that there are none who might heal the swarmpoint.
Keep your eyes open for roaming bandits who will join the fray! Remember this when situating your battles.
Without their conjurers to heal them, you should make quick work of the others.
The swarmpoint is known for his unmatchable strength. Send your hardiest allies to bear the brunt of his might while the others slowly drain his vitality.
Reinforcements! See to the conjurers before your efforts are rendered to naught.
Another unit! You know what you must do!
Not all their spellweavers are masters of the curative arts. Learn to distinguish the healers from the rest!
Lo! There is a conjurer in your midst! Find the cur and slay him!
Use the guild-issue items to your advantage.
Take care not to succumb to the enfeebling effects of the charmed creatures' attacks.
Beware the enfeebling properties of Briaxio's attacks.
Reinforcements called
Beware! The foul poisons of these creatures will disrupt your humours and send your body into fits.
Do not let the poisons overwhelm you! Use the time between battles to purge the toxins from your veins.
Confirm that each of your allies knows his role. One misstep could mean a man poisoned, paralyzed...or worse!
Use the spell Esuna to your advantage! And if that fails you, a good old antidote will often do the trick.
Without an ally to draw his magicks away from the others, Briaxio will unleash his bane on all of you!
Briaxio's followers have rushed to his aid! Send several of your allies to drive off the reinforcements while those remaining keep Briaxio under control.
Destroy the goblins' makeshift barricades and continue up the Matron's Lethe.
Avoid Stikflix Grumblytoss's bombs.
The goblins hide behind their barricades. You must destroy these obstacles to reach them. However, be always aware of their bombs.
The bombs wielded by Stikflix Grumblytoss are much deadlier and have a greater blast radius than those used by his ragtag army.
Remember your roles within the party and communicate with your allies. Those are the keys to victory!
If a bomb is tossed your way, do not panic. Simply retreat until it detonates and then return to the front lines.
I shall give the goblins credit where credit is due. It must have taken them a half-turn of the sun to drag these crates into place... Now demolish them!
The first station is toppled, but another lies near the top of the heavenspillar. Forward, adventurers!
The goblins' leader, Stikflix Grumblytoss, awaits ahead! Give him no quarter!

Stikflix Grumblytoss may not appear to be the most formidable of foes, but his realm-shaking explosives make him a force to be reckoned with. If one happens to land in your vicinity, you would take my advice and run.
Rotten jam will emerge from the stale bubbles if ignored. Burst them before they burst on their own.
When burst, acid bubbles will emit a harmful, corrosive liquid. Avoid attacking them at all costs.
Rotten jam! That's why I warned you to burst the stale bubbles. Now you have that <var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var> to deal with!
That wasn't so hard now, was it?
What did the damn morbol do, pass wind!? See to the bubbles afore they see to you!
I reckon you've done this before. That was some proper combat, if I do say so meself.
What are you fixing to do? Get us all killed?
Not another! Just the smell alone is enough to make a man retch! Do away with the thing, would you?
The stale bubbles, not the acid bubbles, you mud-brained dullard!
Send the damned thing back to the hell it slithered up from!
Good eyes, adventurers! Good eyes!
Not the most pleasant buggers to fight, are they? Maybe next time you'll heed me words and burst the bubbles first.
See the bastard's vines start to twitch? The creature grows weak!
Leave them stale bubbles be, and from them'll drop a dollop of rancid ooze almost as foul as me ma's gruel. If you don't want to see that happen, burst the bubbles quick.
Buso draws his strength from the blue flames. Extinguish the flames to make him more susceptible to your attacks.
A new blue flame will appear where <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var> is slain. Choose your battles.
If you are branded with Buso's Mark of Pain, distance yourself from your allies so that they are not caught in the Dark Dome.
Those horrible blue flames─they're the aetherial traces of slain voidsent. Our Lifestream won't have the stuff, so the essence remains trapped in the corporeal realm. Buso taps that essence...
You cannot slay a void hound without it leaving behind a flame. If you are to cull the beasts, be ready to deal swiftly with the consequences of your actions.
Buso readies the Mark of Pain! Once marked, you cannot escape the fate you are dealt...but you can spare your allies!
Go! Smother the blue flames! It's the only way to see Buso weakened!
Damn! Another blue flame is lit! Buso grows stronger every moment he basks in its unholy light!
Rise up, adventurer! This battle is not yet lost! Remember the blue flames!
Only one flame remains! Quickly! See it out!
Now is your chance! Tear the fiend limb from limb...from limb from limb!
Buso seeks to mark those allies who douse his flames!
One of you has been marked! For Twelve's sake and the sake of the others, run!
Thrust him back into the void!
Draw Buso away from the blue flames before extinguishing them!

Фс-с-с! С-с-сухокожие!
Повелитель глубин попирует ваш-ш-шими душами!
Мой огонь поглотит твои плоть и душу!
Поддайся инферно!
Предай себя суду огня!
Твоя душа будет гореть вечность!
Ты <var 08 E905 ((сильна, смертная)) ((силён, смертный)) /var>!
Мне противится... Благословление Света?!
Six-onze pinches of firesand

СМЕРТЬ ХОЗЯЕВАМ! ОНИ ЗА ВСЁ ЗАПЛАТЯТ!
БОЛЬШЕ НИКОГДА! НИКОГДА!

Engage the shadowclaw.
Avoid the invincible <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020202 /var> and focus your attacks on the shadowclaw.
Avoid the invincible <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020202 /var> and focus your attacks on the shadowclaw.
Avoid the invincible <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020202 /var> and focus your attacks on the shadowclaw.
<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>)) /var> is all you need be concerned with. Shut all else out.
<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var>)) /var>... Ware his attacks, but do not let the fiend lure you from your objective.

<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var>)) /var> wander 'twixt this realm and theirs, appearing only for a few moments. Pay them no heed, and they will pay you none in turn. Draw too close, and...
Do not be lured in by <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s dance. Keep your distance and keep your head.
Can you not see your blows to <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> have no effect? Avoid its attacks and concentrate your efforts on the shadowclaw.
<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>)) /var>'s magicks can smother the field of battle. Stay light on your feet.
Watch carefully. Order can be discovered in the shadows' movements, if you would but seek it.
You are doing well. The beast weakens.
There is little life left in this one, but do not let down your guard. The battle is far from over.
Never before have I seen such mastery of the battlefield. You have far exceeded my expectations, adventurers.
<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>)) /var> will appear once her subjects are slain.
Watch for <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s order to self-destruct.
The servitors will self-destruct once approached. Either strike them from afar, or avoid them altogether.
All rise for Her Royal Highness! When angered, the queen will order her remaining subjects to self-destruct. Do not get caught in the blast.
The servitors will not hesitate to self-destruct. Steel your defenses!
Bomb chars are just as quick to burst as the servitors. Fall back!
There! To the rear! The bomb chars advance!
There is no end to the bomb chars. Turn your eyes elsewhere.
He who slumbers is doomed to bear the blast's full force. Silence the slimes, lest you succumb to the flames.
The queen's subjects number in the thousands. You cannot dispel them all!
The order has been given! Scatter!
That was but one baronet amongst many. He may have fallen, but another will soon rise to replace him.
Good! The life spills from <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> with every blow!
When the queen falls, her subjects will be overtaken with grief and end their lives. Take care not to join them!
Do not grow overconfident. While one candle gutters, still a hundred bonfires rage.
How little the queen's baronets value their own lives. In a sense, they are the perfect subjects.
The queen will not step down from her throne so easily.
Sound the bells! The queen is dead!
All five <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020302 /var> must be defeated simultaneously.

Listen carefully if you want to live. <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var>)) /var> will not stay dead for long. Allow his dark brothers but a moment, and they'll drag the fallen back from the gates of the seventh hell.
Another formation change!
Make ready! The camios seek to regroup!
They're forming a defensive line!
A circle! The Screaming Circle!
The Wall of Naught! The camios seek a new victim!
The Black Cross renders a single camio invincible. Ignore him and focus your attacks on the rest!
The Demon's Sword! The burden on your front line will be great. Healers, do not fail your allies!
Something rises from the Pit! Do not falter!
Their foul magicks protect him! Your attacks amount to naught!
As long as one cannot be harmed, you will never be able to destroy the lot!
One is down. Quickly! Finish the others!
You see? Slaying one is of no use! You must defeat all five at once if the day is to be yours!
The camio draws strength from the Demon's Sword. He will tear your front line apart!
Follow the camio's eyes! Draw them away from your spell casters!
Do not waste your efforts on the one who cannot be harmed!
Shields up, front line!
Rid the playing field of our new guest!
Back to the task at hand, lads!
Show them only as much mercy as they would show you! None!
You've done it! They can no longer escape their dark demesne!
Protect the Allagan artifacts from the quarreling gigants.
Defeat the leaders to prevent the summoning of reinforcements.
Hurry to the foot of the hill! The artifacts will not protect themselves!
They're fighting amongst themselves! Let them bloody each other's noses before coming in to wipe up the mess!
Small units approach! Keep them off the artifacts!
Gigants from multiple sides! You'll need to divide your strength if the artifacts are to be saved!
The gigas leader, Crius! He will summon his minions if not put to the sword!
Giants to the east! Stop them before they can make the approach!
Hecatoncheires to the south! Slaying them might just anger their leader onto the battlefield!
Thal's balls! Both giant <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> hecatoncheir leaders make for the artifacts!
Damnation! Keep the leaders away from one another! It will only serve to worsen matters!
The gigants swing their weapons with reckless abandon! Draw them from the artifacts so as to prevent any collateral damage!
The gigas leader flees! Now is your chance! Run the bastard through!
The giant leader falls back... Something is amiss!
That is not the back of a fleeing man! The hecatoncheir leads you into a trap!
More gigants take the field, and will continue to do so until you have seen their leaders slain!
Not a single scratch on any of the artifacts. I wouldn't believe it if I hadn't seen it with mine own eyes!
All the artifacts remain! The Sons of Saint Coinach will be pleased!
Two artifacts remain standing. See that they are not destroyed!
A single artifact remains! You cannot allow it to be lost!
The leaders have yet to take the field, but could arrive at any moment. Stay alert!
Without an enemy to strike, the gigants have turned their fury on the artifacts!
<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020202 /var>)) /var>
Slay all the enemies

Place which object?
<var 2B ((<var 28 ((EventItem)) E80201 /var>)) /var>.
Cancel.
It sits motionless.
A statuette has already been placed.
Никто не смеет противиться воле лорда ван Бельсара!
Мои щиты неприступны! Множество соперников не смогли их пробить!
Твое поражение продвинет план лорда ван Бельсара на шаг вперед!
Ух... Пусть это и будет мне стоить жизни... Но я <var 1A 02 /var>сражу<var 1A 01 /var> тебя!
Хе-хе-хе ХА-ХА-ХА ха-ха-ха ХЕ-ХЕ-ХЕ-Е-Е-Е!!!
Вы обречены, жалкие смертные!
ЧАС РАСПЛАТЫ НАСТАЛ!!!
Не надейтесь спастись! СПАСЕНИЯ НЕТ!!!
Умрите! УМРИТЕ!! УМРИ-И-И-ИТЕ!!!
Моя сила... Нет...
Сыны людей! Убийцы моих детей!
Моя ненависть к вам вечна и неизменна!
Содрогнитесь пред могуществом земли!
Я буду бороться с вами до конца!
Сокрушу тебя своей пятой, смертный!
Бегите, дети, бегите во тьму!.. Вам с <var 08 E905 ((ней)) ((ним)) /var> не совладать...
Я здесь... я здесь... я здесь...
Мама... папа... Не могу... найти вас...
ПРОСНИТЕ-Е-ЕСЬ!!!
Почему... почему... ПОЧЕМУ-У-У?!
Я вернулся! Я вернулся!.. Я здесь... я здесь... я здесь...
Где вы?.. Где вы...

Imperial Identification Key
Darken the searchlight
Darken the searchlight
Stand back! I'm going to blast open the bulkhead!
This might take a while! Watch my back!
I'm almost there! Keep that thing occupied!
Иди сюда, <var 1A 02 /var>герой<var 1A 01 /var>, и покажи, на что ты способен. Покажи мне... <var 1A 02 /var>всё<var 1A 01 /var>!
Вот как...
Ты больше <var 1A 02 /var>ничего<var 1A 01 /var> не заберешь у меня!
Твои страдания будут в тысячу раз сильнее моих!
Эй, вы! Помогите вы уже наконец!
Ты меня <var 1A 02 /var>разозлил<var 1A 01 /var>!
Не-е-ет! Я не проиграю... <var 08 E905 ((такому)) ((такой)) /var>, как <var 1A 02 /var>ты<var 1A 01 /var>!
Damn it, that colossus is enhanced! Hold on─I'll try to think of something!

Победите Ультиму
Defeat Lahabrea
You'll need proper firepower to blast through that. Try and find another path to the armor bay.
There ought to be an identification key reader nearby. You need to complete pilot registration before you can activate an armor.
Well, well, would you look at this! I've found just the unit for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
I'll send the identification data to the terminal. You can use that to activate her.
Я взял на себя смелость подготовить для тебя <var 1A 02 /var>шокирующую<var 1A 01 /var> сцену.
Позволь представить тебе одно из моих изобретений. Для тебя он будет довольно <var 1A 02 /var>подручным<var 1A 01 /var>.
Гарлонд падёт передо мной, но сначала я сокрушу тебя!
Я больше не буду... чьей-то тенью!
Давай потанцуем, чемпион Эорзии.
Впечатляет! Теперь <var 1A 02 /var>моя<var 1A 01 /var> очередь!
Yaaaaaarrrgh!
Ультима собрала в себе силу айконов! Никто не сможет ему противостоять!
Услышь меня, носитель кристалла. Твой враг — Тьма, облаченная в сталь.
Если ты хочешь победить, тебе нужно обратиться к Свету.
Подчинись шторму!
Эссенция Гаруды... вырывается из Ультимы?!
Kneel to the might below!
Titan's as well!? Impossible!
Succumb to the flames!
Nooo! How...how are you doing this!?
We settle this once and for all!
I need not the power of eikons to defeat you!
This is most...unexpected. You are possessed of great might, this I will allow.
Yet yours is not the might of a ruler! Such is the difference between us─a difference that will assure my victory!
U-Ultima!? Curse you, Ascian!
How much destruction must be wreaked before you are sated!?
I have not the strength...to shield thee again...
Permit not the manifestation of that vile magick...lest Darkness prevail!
Your time is at an end, Hydaelyn!
From the deepest pit of the seven hells to the very pinnacle of the heavens, the world shall tremble! Unleash Ultima!
Ahahahaha! You are strong, Warrior of Light!
Yet know that if I should perish, so too will the mortal within whose flesh I reside.
Now make your choice and live with it! Muahahahahaha!
Mark not the Dark Minion's subtle words.
Only Light may banish the Darkness.
Receive of me this power, my child, and raise thy Crystal aloft!
Ultima detonation in 20 seconds.
Ultima detonation in 10 seconds.
Ultima detonation in 5...

Fight on, Enkidu, my ever faithful─hm!?
You'll get no quarter from me this time. Have at thee!
You have some skill, I'll give you that... But Gilgamesh has only just begun to fight!
Most impressive! Very well─I, too, shall fight with all my strength!
No! The mighty Gilgamesh will not be defeated!
Enkidu! Are the bonds of our friendship so fragile!?
We claim victory this day, or Ishgard falls! Accept the Fury into your heart, and defend this bridge with your life's blood!
Slings and arrows shall avail us little against this foe. Ready the cannons!
They seek to swarm the healers! Focus your attacks on the dragonflies!
Blast! They've broken through the second layer, but there are yet two more wards behind that! Fight on!
Climb the tower, and man the dragonkiller! Steady now! Time your shot!
A hit! The monster felt that one, by the Fury!
Bah, a wasted bolt. We'd best make the other dragonkillers count!
Biasts! Don't let them rush the cannons!
Another ward down! Bleed them! Bleed them for every step! Our defenses grow thin...
They mean to overwhelm us... Prepare the snares! Slow their advance!
Well done!
Damn these Dravanian devils! Keep faith, now! This battle is far from lost!
It dodged the bloody missile! A creature of that size...
Horde reinforcements have arrived! Put down those aevis!
The wards are destroyed! Pull back! We make our final stand before the Arc of the Worthy!
If it breathes, we are lost! Use both the snares! Choke its throat closed!
Now! To the dragonkiller! Skewer the foul beast while it thrashes!
By all that is holy...
A fine shot! Now we finish this scaled demon once and for all!
More Dravanians have landed! Slay those drakes before they reach the powder kegs!
Move away from the kegs! You'll be caught in the blast!
Now! Ignite the powder kegs!
Hah! That inflicted some hurt! Back into the fray!
Bah! The timing was off...
The Arc of the Worthy is at our backs! May Halone grant us the strength to die well in its shadow!
Daniffen's Collar is naught but dust on the Sea of Clouds. What hope now for Ishgard...?
Shout your triumph to the heavens, my friends! This day belongs to Ishgard─and her blessed defenders!

As you might have guessed, the purpose of this exercise is to teach cooperation.
Your ally will hold the enemy's attention─it is your job to take the foe down!
味方と協力して、敵を討伐できれば訓練合格だよ！
Defeat the axe-wielding training partner!
Attack the same foe as your ally to win the battle!
That's the way, novice! I'll keep him occupied─you concentrate on bringing him down!
Very good! Now here's a hint about enemy facing!
Your opponent will have a harder time avoiding blows from the flanks or from behind.
There are also certain techniques that perform better when executed from such positions.
When it comes to your place in a party you are the sharp end of the spear.
Simply put, your role is to inflict as much damage as possible, while keeping your own skin intact.
As such, you cannot just attack whichever enemy you please!
If you strike a foe other than one controlled by your ally, then you risk becoming the target of deadly aggression.
Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
For this exercise, you will be fighting multiple opponents!
The key to victory is coordination with your comrades─each foe will fall all the swifter under a focused assault!
Pay attention, novice! Target the enemy engaged by your ally!
Coordinate with your allies and defeat the enemy!
Mark well the opponent your ally has engaged, and attack the same enemy!
Start the fight with the staff waver─such foes are often the most dangerous, but the least robust.
Be sure to attack the same enemy as your ally! Strike the wrong foe five times and you fail this exercise!
That's the way, novice! Once this one's down, we'll move on to the fistfighter!
There's another yet standing! Don't lose your focus!
He's almost done for! Grind him into the dust!
Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
Do you remember the lesson where I had you evading enemy attacks?
This exercise will put that training to the test. You must needs plan your strikes around some fancy footwork!
You must pay attention! Watch for the signs whilst you press the attack!
Engage the axe wielder, but keep an eye out for counterattacks!
Defeat the enemy while avoiding attacks!
If you allow yourself to be hit five times, we will start this exercise again from the beginning!
Well done! Slippery as an eel, novice!
Not bad, aye... Care to dodge this!?
Victory is within reach! Be on your guard until the very last!
Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
This exercise will teach you how to deal with enemy reinforcements.
As the battle progresses, new foes will appear on the field.
These sudden arrivals will target your weakest comrade, so you must be quick to eliminate them!
Your healer is under attack! Swiftly now! Eliminate the aggressor!
Another enemy has arrived on the field! Engage this new foe!
Keep an eye peeled for reinforcements, novice!
Defeat the enemy while staying alert for reinforcements!
Excellent! You handled the situation perfectly!
Here comes another! Make short work of this skirmisher!
Very good! Now see the battle to its end!
Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
In this exercise, you will learn to manipulate the battlefield.
During the battle, enemies will pour forth from the rear gate. New foes will continue to flood in whilst this portal remains open.
You must operate the lever that closes the gate, or your party will be overwhelmed!
The reinforcements are without end! Quickly─use the lever to close the gate!
Manipulate the battlefield and defeat the enemy!
Engage the enemy, but be wary of the gate!
The gate has opened! Ignore the reinforcements for now, and operate the lever!
Well done! The flood of enemies has ceased! Now mop up the foes remaining!
Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
Now that you understand what is expected of you, we can continue with the lesson.
The upcoming exercise requires that you keep your ally healed.
When it comes to your place in a party you are the soothing wind of restoration.
When you've healed all there is to heal, there may be time to weave in some offensive magicks.
Heal your ally and defeat the axe-wielding training partner!
Your primary concern should be healing your ally!
But keep an eye on your companion! You should not be blasting if someone is bleeding!
As such, rather than engaging the enemy directly, your primary role is to focus upon the mending of wounds.
With the support of your diligent healing, your party will prevail against even the most savage of foes!
Provide support, defeat the enemy, and victory will be yours!
In this next exercise, you will be healing multiple allies.
You will need to stay alert, and switch your attention between allies as the situation demands.

Focus your attention on the well-being of your companions!

I've long awaited this chance, <var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) /var>)) /var>!
I trust you will show me no favors! Meet me as you would an equal!
<pant> <pant> I yield! I yield! By the Navigator... <pant> <pant> That was...<var 1A 02 /var>inspirational<var 1A 01 /var>!

We'll do our best not to gut ye, darlin', but once we taste blood, well...<var 1A 02 /var>old 'abits die 'ard<var 1A 01 /var>.

Змии сражаются и когтем, и магией. Сможете ли вы выстоять против пламени и могучих ударов?
Дальше ты не пройдёшь, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Я н-не боюсь твоего громкого имени, купо!

Вы справились... но я поныне не убеждён. Пора испытать ваши пределы.

Герои людей! Услышьте мою ярость!
Последняя строка моей песни!

Мой милый Яфаэм... Ты превратился в жуткое болото.
Видите те обломки? Должно быть, одно из сбитых суден Когтей.
Кажется, это часовня Белой Девы. Мы попадём в Мхак, если спустимся вниз по течению!
Кхе-кхе... Тьфу... Я не слишком большой фанат воды...
Направляйтесь к той пирамиде, но берегитесь демонов. Воздух кажется густым от присутствия порождений...
О, чудеса архитектуры Мхака. Полторы тысячи лет, потоп, а здание стоит как стояло.
На нашем пути чудовищная сфера, в своё время поглотившая целые города. Мы должны доказать свою силу, чтобы пройти к Нулевому камню.
Вот оно — хранилище Нулевого камня. Наверное, здесь страж. В таких местах всегда есть страж...
Ха-ха! Ещё эти кровяные колбаски?! Ох, как я сегодня попирую!
Назойливые насекомые! Как вы смеете тут шнырять?
Ба! Слабее всех! Слабее всех! Я отведаю вашей плоти, и вот тогда...
Испуганы, моя драгоценная добыча? Взгляните в глаза истинному ужасу!
Что это за добыча... которая так сопротивляется?.. Надо предупредить... остальных...
О, некоторые из вас выжили. Как раз кстати. Мне нужна пара-тройка душ, дабы разбить защиту.
После всего... я восстал... Чтобы быть здесь похороненным?..
Даже у пустых оболочек есть применение. Глядите, как они танцуют по моему велению!
Я покажу тем, кто мне противостоит, насколько бесполезна их борьба...
Со временем ваши жалкие душонки будут моими. Но сперва следует наказать вас за наглость!
Одиночество ослабляет дух и искажает плоть... Разбегайтесь... и страдайте!
Готовы ли вы взглянуть на мир, который ждёт вас после смерти? Испейте из чаши забвения!
О, как сладок жуткий ветер преисподней... Это дуновение сорвёт плоть с ваших костей!
Восстаньте, мои игрушки! На доске ещё много места.
Моя нежить так легко ломается. Возможно, прислужники окажутся понадёжнее...
Как утомительно. Я думал, вы отдадите свою энергию мне. Но если вы и дальше намерены цепляться за жизни...
Узрите свою судьбу! Узрите свою погибель в моём адском свете!
Мой повелитель предупреждал, что могут вмешаться смертные... Но вы мне не ровня! Я управляю целым кланом демонов!
Знайте своего убийцу, пришельцы! Кровь демонов дала мне силы вознестись!..
Узрите мои великолепные волосы! От этих локонов вы можете потерять голову!
Достойны ли вы вообще прикасаться к моим волосам?
Бесстыдные воры! Наглые мародёры! Вам не видать Нулевого камня!
Вы когда-нибудь видели такое совершенство?! Кончики моих волос острее, чем клинки!
...Как вы выжили? Я призвала всю силу бездны! Что за нечестивая сила бурлит в <var 1A 02 /var>ваших<var 1A 01 /var> жилах?
Ха-ха-ха! Мои кудри искупаются в вашей крови!
Посмеете ли вы взглянуть на сияние моей необузданной славы? Или повернётесь спиной и познаете боль моего отказа?..
Моя гордость подрезана... Моя сила отнята... Нулевой камень ваш...
Вредители! Черви! Я создам ещё паутину! Да! Нужно опутать вас.
Вы чего наделали? Вся моя паутина испорчена!
Чего вы так вертитесь! Вы испортили ещё одну паутину!
Грубое тело, из камня рождённое... Рукою изваяно, рунами жжёное...
Магический разум внушил повеленье... Тому, кто живет, сеять чтоб разрушенье...
Вся мощь чародейства во мне разгорится... В огне уничтожены будут мокрицы!..
Искра создателя навеки исчезает... Расколото тело, глаза затухают...

Глядите, впереди — тот остров из книги! Давайте отыщем местечко, где бы припарковать эту дылду.
Эти здания были построены как убежище для беженцев Мхака. Земля обетованная, забытая по прошествии веков...
...Демоны тут уже всё захватили, как мы и ожидали. Это место стало гнездовьем тьмы и отчаяния.
Саркофаг Королевы — разбитый. Значит, Скатах уже пробудилась...
Впереди злая магия — вон как мои усы загибаются. Только сама Королева в состоянии излучать такую мощную угрозу!
Наглые смертные... Как вы посмели явиться в замок Королевы Тьмы без приглашения?
Простите, повелительница... Это жалкое создание вас подвело...
О, как я люблю развлекать незваных гостей! Или погодите... в толпе есть знакомые лица!
Увы, моё шоу подходит к концу... Обойдёмся без антракта.
Приветствую, смертные, в цитадели мрака. Вы пришли насытить его тени подношением из своих душ?
Какой пронзительный свет... Он пробьётся в каждый тёмный уголок, прогонит все тени...
Вы ожидаете, что я такое же существо как раньше, связанное ограничителями? Ха! Узрите теперь мою полную силу!
Пожалуй, открою врата в Бездну... Ночные гончие уже идут по запаху вашего страха.
Ещё разлом... Ещё один шанс испытать вашу силу?
Даже вечный покой не избавит вас от ужаса, созданного мною!
Энергия бездны будет моей! Я искупаюсь в предвечной пустоте!
Склонитесь перед могуществом Бездны!
Что вы делаете? Собираетесь лишить меня контроля над порталом?
Так и быть. Состязание! Испытание, в котором у вас нет надежды на победу.
Невозможно! Я повелитель Бездны, вы... Ар-р-р-р!
...Моё заточение... ослабило меня сильнее, чем я думал...
Но это ещё не конец! Узрите, с какой целью была освобождена королева на самом деле!
Да! Восторг! Бесконечный источник тьмы! Вы уничтожили нечестивый сосуд Скатах, тем самым напитав меня её силой!
Из глубин колодца теней явится ваша погибель!
Неужто я вынужден прибегнуть к самой энергии смерти, дабы избавиться от вас?!
Что мне делать?.. Каким должен быть поток тьмы... чтобы смести ваш свет?..
Жуткие тени, идите на мой зов!
Ко мне, мой протеже! Уничтожь эти чужаков искусством, которому я тебя обучила!

Сосредоточьтесь!

Что-то не так... его чешуя затвердела!
Без своего рыка ты ничто!

Вы рождены лишь с целью умереть!

Молю вас, именем Зодиарка!

Наша трагедия не повторится!

Я отстрою царство на ваших костях.
Будущее этой планеты в моих руках!

Умрите!
Тьма, храни меня!
Немыслимо! Хочешь расколоть мою душу?

Бегите, глупцы!
Тьма восторжествует!
Утоните в отчаянии!
Братья мои, покойтесь в мире...
Я не забуду ваши надежды, мечты, ваши мольбы!
Я погашу искры ваших ничтожных жизней!
Пойте в отчаянии, братья мои!
Станьте воплощением наших надежд...
Нашими молитвами наш прекрасный мир вновь вернётся!
Да разверзнется голодная бездна!
Поглоти весь Свет, и добавь его к своей Тьме!
Впечатляющая стойкость... Но это не важно. У меня впереди целая вечность!

I am unbreakable, unstoppable!

Begone!

Drown in despair!

In Zodiark's name, I beseech you!

Damn you... Damn your wretched blessing!

<var 1A 02 /var>We<var 1A 01 /var> are the blessed! <var 1A 02 /var>We are the chosen<var 1A 01 /var>!

All units: fire at will.

Stay close.

Good enough. Let's go.

This way.

Potential score manipulation detected. Offense taken.
Evaluation suspended. Discarding subjects.

Subject persistence duly noted as “irritating.”
Further manipulation detected. Offense heightened.
Alert: Subjects advised that failure to follow instructions will be punished.
High Alert: Subjects advised that failure to be punished will be punished.
Danger: Subjects advised to die faster.

How...dare...you...
Anomaly...dete...cted...commend...re...pair...

Each of them has a core. Destroy that, and it can't function.

A flight unit. This should speed things up.
It's been hacked!
I've taken control. This way.

Those arms are nasty. Keep your distance.
Now charging. Please wait.
Support units. Nothing a few missiles won't solve.
I suppose we'll do this the hard way.
Now annihilating. Please wait.

Prepare for breach!

Incendiary readied. Remain still while crushing commences.

Support required. Activating Marx units.

Critical da...mage...sustai...ned. Please...wait... Please...

Oh, fly off and leave us to clamber over the giant scary machine, why don't you.

You're the one who's going to die here, 9S.
These Goliaths sure are handy!
He's hacking Engels. Arm incoming!

And again.
Die already!

He's coming back this way!

<cough> <cough> ...Particularly as I just breathed some in.

Задействовать синтетический аурацит... Все системы функционируют!

This is Bozja Citadel, alright. At least...I think it is. Was everything so distorted when you tested this before?
Your recollection of this place appears grossly incomplete. I can but assume your memory is being warped by your subconscious.
Well I'd rather not stand around laboring over details. Let's look for the transmission tower in the Principia. Anything of import would've been stored there.
You've done it, Cid! The road has returned.

A curious question. One I believe worth investigating. Shall we?

Let's begin the G-Warrior training simulation. I've prepared three trials to teach you the basics.
First, I want you to try attacking the guidance system. Don't worry, it won't fight back!
The G-Warrior is armed with a range of weaponry. Now's your chance to learn what it's capable of.
So far, so good. Let's move on to something a bit more advanced, shall we?
If you feel you've already learned enough, you can end the simulation by accessing the training node.
But once you begin combat, you won't be able to leave the simulation until it's over.
All right, let's continue.
The G-Warrior also comes equipped with the Pyretic Booster, which diverts even more power to its weapons and increases its speed and maneuverability.
This, however, comes at a price. Activating it places a huge strain on the G-Warrior, so it must only be used in short bursts.
That's why it's best to practice here before heading into battle. Now, try activating the Pyretic Booster!
You'll notice that your movement speed is much improved. But as shown on your monitor, the G-Warrior becomes more and more structurally unstable as time passes.
To deactivate the Pyretic Booster, press the same button again.
Now to try using the Pyretic Booster to destroy the target.
This time, the node will launch wide reaching attacks in quick succession. But with your increased movement speed, you should have no trouble evading them.
Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You'd best deactivate the Pyretic Booster while I explain the final trial.
Are you listening? Quickly, deactivate the Pyretic Booster! Even though it's only a simulation, it'll terminate prematurely if you're not careful.
We've covered offense, now to look at defense. This is where the Aetherial Aegis should come in handy.
Unfortunately, you can't keep the barrier up indefinitely as it will drain the G-Warrior's power reserves. You might even run out of energy for the weapons, so watch out.
First, let's try deploying the Aetherial Aegis.
The monitor shows how much power is being drained. Don't let it get too low!
That's enough for now. Turn off the barrier using the same button used to deploy it.
For the last trial, we'll use the Aetherial Aegis while attempting to destroy the target.
Unlike before, there is no way to escape its attacks, so you'll need to weather them using the barrier.
You're a natural! All right, that's everything. Time to end the simulation.
You'll need to deactivate the Aetherial Aegis before you run out of power!
That's as much damage as the G-Warrior can take. If this was a real combat situation, you'd be...well, let's not dwell on that.
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? We can't test the Pyretic Booster if you don't activate it.
Having trouble finding the button for the Aetherial Aegis? It should be clearly marked...
Auto Restoration can mitigate a certain amount of damage incurred, but don't rely on it to carry you through the battle!
Deploy the Aetherial Aegis to weather the storm!

With balance comes life, insatiable and all-consuming.
We shall return all to nothingness.
Hope, despair...they are what feeds us...
Unleash the shadows!
I will imitate your every move. When you attack, I attack. When you cast a spell, I'll cast a spell.
...So you seek to do perfectly nothing, perfectly? A clever tactic, but I have the entire Masked Carnivale to mimic.
What's taking so long!? Drop the performance art and go for the throat, just like you've seen me doing business!
Very well. I shall emulate your way of “doing business.”
Behold the essence of mimicry... I answer your arcane assault in kind!
Anything you can do, I can do better... A strike for a strike!
Защищайте Ализе!
Передайте часть своего эфира Ализе!
Одолейте прогрызателя 2-го Ордена!
Передайте ещё часть своего эфира Ализе!
Девчонка что-то задумала! Патриарх в опасности! Убить её! Уничтожить, раздавить, убить!
Ну что тут скажешь?..
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> — подтащи големов поближе ко мне! Я с ними в два счёта разделаюсь!
...Да, готово! Вперёд, Анжело!
Ай... его перековка слишком сильна... уф... Я не могу...
Похоже, эфира одного человека не хватает...
Они собираются ударить по Ализе! Эй все, соберитесь вместе!
Альфино! Мы с тобой должны передать часть эфира Ализе!
Спасибо вам... Я снова попробую!
А-а-ай... Я почти выдохся...
Седьмое пекло, их слишком много...
Оставьте это мне! Эй, все, разойдись!
Безумие... Ализе, давай — это твой шанс!
Отлично! Прошу... Прошу, пусть сработает!
Уф... почти... уф... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, пожалуйста, поделись и своим эфиром!
Хе-хе-хе, конец тебе, девка! Смерть, финиш, конец!
Нет, Адмира! Это слишком опасно.
Нет, я твёрдо решила перед тем, как прийти сюда. Чего бы мне это ни стоило, Лимса заключит мир.
Убить <var 08 E905 ((последнюю)) ((последнего)) /var>! Уничтожить, размазать, убить!
Спасибо! На этот раз сработает, обещаю!
Уф... вот этого не хватало...
Бомбы! Нельзя позволить им добраться до Ализе!
Чтоб его!.. Рассредоточьтесь и сдерживайте их!
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, ещё немного эфира! Самую малость, и я <var 1A 02 /var>смогу<var 1A 01 /var> это закончить!
Defeat the Shadowkeeper
By your sacrifice, a warrior born... I will show you no mercy, and expect none in return!
I am the Shadowkeeper! There is no escape from me!
Cloaked in shadow, I lie in wait!
Death stalks at every turn!
Your shadow is mine to command!
Stabbed in the back, in more ways than one!
My world, consumed by Darkness. The source of my power...
All shadow is my dominion, and yours is no exception!
For all your strength, you are helpless to resist!
This is the end of our adventure. You meant the world to me...
Defeat Misija and her imperial troops!
Defeat Delta Gabriel!
Take no prisoners. I want them all dead!
あの金色の機体は、私が引き付けましょう！
解放者殿は、ミーシィヤと、 その他の魔導兵器を頼みます……！
Admirable... But futile nonetheless. Ready the delta armor!
皆さん、私のところへ集まってください！
くっ……皆さん、ご無事ですか……！？
あの攻撃を耐え抜いただと……！？ だが、これで終いと思うなよ！

This is the tower's network. Its digital consciousnesses are here.
Don't waste time trying to understand. We're here to kill the enemy. That's all.
What, aren't you enjoying yourselves?
You know what will happen to the sphere's creations when it's destroyed.
Don't worry about it. There's no actual meaning behind anything machines do.
It's locked.
Right─I'll hack the door, you infiltrate the network and take down any guards.
We're in! Let's go.
Here we go again. Hacking in three...two...!
Whatever they're planning, we need to stop them before it's too late!
To live...is to know loneliness... To live...is to know love...
I'll live as many times as it takes... I'll die as many times as it takes... To know... To know... To know...
They're all─ <var 1A 02 /var>No<var 1A 01 /var>! I don't want to be alone...
Let your voices...be heard...
Sing with me...
Such...delights... Did you...have fun?
You will be among the first to see the new world...
Destroy the target.
...But we still have some time. Why not enjoy it?
Multiple heat signatures coming from around the target. Be ready!
Can you hear it? The final song...
We've waited so long to throw these gates wide...
Let the light in!
Where...?
All memory lives within me.
It's manipulating the space around us.
So many dreams slumber here...
Right below us!
Each memory's form is unique.
Watch the periphery!
We will sooなく...danger...the traんろ. To ensure your safety...pleassssさイ...
Again!?
The final song...just for you.
You'll need to match wavelengths to create interference.
You would render all this meaningless?
You will soon find out how lowly you are.
They're going to fall. Move!
AH♪ ah♪ ah♪ ah♪
Even if you defeat us... Do you really think you'll win?
We're prepared to fight until the end. Yours, or ours.
You fight and fight and fight... You're made that way, after all.
You have so little control over your nature...
All you can do is watch as the world falls to ruin.
A logic virus! It's interfering with my hacking!
Destroy its core!
We made it.
Not half bad.
Your little alliance is pointless.
You'll never compare to us.
Ahahaha! You probably think you're clever. But we've had just about enough...
Massive energy readings! Don't take your eyes off it.
Self-replication! There's another on the side!
Get as far away as you can!
It'll knock us off if we're not careful.
Ahahaha! You'll never eliminate us...
A defense program. Choose your target carefully.
You need to destroy the obstructing consciousnesses from inside the network.
Something's coming... Don't forget about that copy.
An energy signal! Watch which way it turns.

Асцианец был пару раз замечен над полем боя, но с тех пор пропал. Наверняка он будет следить из теней...
Передвижения лунных праймалов трудно понять. Мы пытались устроить засаду, но вражеские войска по неизвестной причине отступают...
Какой бы ни была цель Уничтожителей, наша основная цель — праймалы.
Ясно! Им не сбежать от Хранителей!
Разделимся, дабы побыстрее отыскать праймалов. Я с Танкредом и Я'штолой отправлюсь на восток...
Тогда я на запад. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Альфино, со мной.
Я займусь перекованными. Если повезёт, будет шанс их исцелить.
Я отвлеку их! Остальные, на поиски праймалов!
Их т-так много...
Ни о каком лечении не может идти речи... сперва нужно обездвижить их!
Боюсь, их перековка слишком сильна... излечить их прямо сейчас не выйдет.
Если успели измениться их тела, исцеление невозможно. Пускай они и имперцы, такой боли не заслужил никто...
Я должен избавить их от страданий!
Пока никаких подкреплений... все в порядке?
Это... Один? Поглядим, чей клинок окажется сильнее. За мной!
Я разберусь с цепями! Урианже, твоя очередь быть щитом!
Не к добру... Готовьтесь!
Уф... Такая сила! Нам втроём следует защищать средоточие!
Но сперва окажем помощь Танкреду!
Один готовится ударить! Берегитесь его клинка — но не забудьте про средоточие!
До сих пор жив... Груша для битья.
Что ж, уважим его!
Значит, мы должны защитить средоточие от зверя...
Это Равана?.. Могучий оппонент, как ни крути, — но и мы не промах!
Словно мотыльки к огню... Нужно защитить средоточие, но их так много!..
Позволь мне! Я применю <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>«Замри!»<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> — это выиграет нам время!
Ладно, попробуем... Шанс есть всегда!
Он притягивает эфир... Г'раха, останови сферы заклинанием <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>«Замри!»<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Я сейчас разрушу его защиту, но нужно время!
Понял... Надеюсь, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>«Замри»<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> не подведёт...
Отлично, готово... Сейчас или никогда!
Лунный Ифрит... Напавший на Аренвальда и Фордолу.
Серьёзный противник. Глядите в оба.
Что за дьявольщина? Явно ничего хорошего. Разбейте их, пока не случилась беда!
Ещё?! Наш враг намерен уничтожить средоточие, и нас вместе с ним!
Значит, настало время...
Пока я дышу, не сдамся!
Пора кончать...
Нельзя тут долго задерживаться!
Значит, нас решили задавить числом?..
Минутная передышка...
Воспользуемся моментом, чтобы исцелить перекованных!
I won't let you harm my sister!
Time for my next trick! G-Savior Mark II, opening containment field!
Use the teleporter to move between decks!
Accessing Ruby Weapon data, deploying claws! Milisandia, grant me your strength!
Accessing Emerald Weapon data, deploying beam units! This is for you, Rex!
Accessing Sapphire Weapon data, opening chest armor! I won't let you down, Ricon!
Accessing all Weapon data! Now we fight together!
This was never going to be easy... Let's see what you make of <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>!
I have to keep fighting until my dream─<var 1A 02 /var>our dream<var 1A 01 /var>─has been realized!
The true face of the Diamond Weapon...
Stay sharp! It's far more agile than before!

The Mark II is in need of repair! Fall back!
Raising magitek field! There's no escape!
At this rate, it'll overheat... Restoring armor!
Don't worry, Allie. I'll keep you safe!
G-Savior, returning to battle! Opening containment field!
Removing the armor increases its speed, but it can't maintain that level of output. Now is our chance!
Sorry to keep you waiting! The repairs to the Mark II should keep it airborne for now!
So, it can enhance its agility, but only for a short while... We'd best pin it down while we still can!
Purging armor! Diamond Weapon, show them what you're made of!
Today, we fight as one!
<var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the strength we gave our lives to obtain... The flame of hope will burn forever!
Wait, that's not Allie! No, it cannot be...
Our dream will not─cannot─end here...

Intruder detected. Analyzing potential for knowledge acquisition... Affirmative.
Additional data desired. Transferring Omega unit to present coordinates.
Recalibrating threat levels... Deploying draconic specimen.
Analyzing combat data... Fascinating. Deploying new rocket-propelled armaments.
Capabilities exceed expected values. Initializing transformation sequence.
Neural structure of hostile life-forms analyzed. Stand by for interruption to combat functions.
まさか……敗北…… 敗北したと……戦略に致命的な誤りがあったと……！？
Projection into simulated memory confirmed. You now witness the final war between our kind.
With the Alphatron Star's resources depleted beyond hope of sustainability, we were on the brink of destruction.
As part of the faction favoring subjugation of other stars, it created units for the upcoming invasion.
<whirr> Stigma-4 detected! Eliminate the unit guarding it and destroy its core!
Stigma-4 has initiated evasive action. Establishing connection with next memory region...
This memory region reflects our people's first encounter with another star─the subjugation of Gordhona.
Configuring data stream... Neural pathway connected.
The Lambda unit before you was produced in Gordhona with local materials, as became our standard operating protocol.
Stigma-4 has retreated into the next memory region. This unit requests you pursue with all haste.
As this unit projected, this memory is of our conflict on the Dragonstar.
<whirr> The dragons' assault has created a breach in the barrier. Infiltrate the facility!
<whirr> Access to Stigma-4's perceived “self” confirmed! Destroy this core to overwrite its expectation of victory.
Alert: Your presence has been detected. Sentinel units approaching current coordinates!
Those who would claim the resources of other stars clashed with those who believed that Alphatron might yet be saved.
At this time, Stigma-4─then known as “Alpha-4”─was positioned in the weapons manufacturing facility ahead.
Now approaching command sector. Accessing administrative memory to disable security system...
Our objective was to obtain the rich mineral resources of the Gordhonite asteroid belt─by any means necessary.
The Gordhonites boasted considerably advanced technology, but their machines proved inferior to the invading force.
The dragons were our strongest enemy, and it was through their capture and study that Stigma-4 learned the principles of adaptive evolution.
These principles were used to design the systems of the Omega model─first deployed in an unfinished state.

С горящих небес обрушатся кометы отчаяния...
Всё сгорит!

Мне не нужны никакие оковы!
Это невозможно... я бог... Я бог!
А теперь конец вам и всему, чем вы дорожите.
Да восстанет Тьма!
Увидите ли вы апокалипсис?
Как долго я этого ждал!
Работа всей моей жизни... шедевр!

Кристаллы Света, ко мне!

Новое оружие... Следите за моими движениями!

А теперь!..
Охота в разгаре. Тебе от нас не скрыться, как бы ты ни пыталась скрыться.

Среди звёзд так одиноко.

Two eyes... Some manner of riddle, do you suppose?

Let's see where it leads, shall we?
Golems! And blocking the path we mean to take, no less.
Who would have abandoned their cleaning gear in here?
...And why do I feel I've seen these particular brushes before?
'Twould seem you discovered the custodian's closet...
Have you heard the Ul'dahn folktale of the magicked ewer?
'Tis said that it could scoop up any amount of water at once, and was locked away after it drained an entire oasis.
Я знаю это существо! Это знакомая силки, которая когда-то давно убирала дворец.
Этот последний всплеск эфира подтвердил мои подозрения: это действительно силки что создала моя мать.
What have we here...?
Such a beautiful garden! Not the sort of place one expects to find at the end of a grimy tunnel.
And this tableware...
These things belonged to Mother and Father!
This must have been their quiet little retreat; the familiar put in place to protect it.
I should have liked to come here with them, but 'tis comforting to feel the echo of their presence, nonetheless.
<sigh> Whilst I should like to linger still, I fear Papashan will soon note my absence. Let us be away.
This rug, too, seems a relatively recent addition. See how the stone beneath it is cracked and worn?
'Tis doubtful some thief had a sudden fit of decorating...but we shall leave it for now. Other mysteries abound.
Talk of jugs behind barred doors reminded me of the legend, is all. Shall we continue on?
Я знаю это существо! Это знакомая силки, которая когда-то давно убирала дворец.

What have we here...?
Such a beautiful garden! Not the sort of place one expects to find at the end of a grimy tunnel.

<sigh> Whilst I should like to linger still, I fear Papashan will soon note my absence. Let us be away.

The path leads on and...out? We should brace ourselves for what lies ahead.

Aha! That seemed to do the trick...though the riddle itself yet confounds me. A puzzle for another day.
Such fluffy, puffy flowers...
Gracious! Is that...a gigantic mouse?
Эфир Силки... Точно такой же, как у того что был у матери.
My, what a picturesque scene! See how the sunlight falls upon the flowers just so.
I wonder, could this be the sanctuary of which my parents spoke?

Mother always called it their “secret garden.”
Если предположить, что эта гигантская мышь — силки матери, видимо она была всё это время здесь, для защиты их особого места.
Finding this place must have been the reason Father gave me the key. One reason, at least.
<sigh> Whilst I should like to linger still, I fear Papashan will soon note my absence. Let us be away.

A shelf full of cutlery, and a table made for two... This is a haven of joyful memories.
<sigh> Whilst I should like to linger still, I fear Papashan will soon note my absence. Let us be away.
Mother. Father. I will do all in my power to see this sanctuary remains unspoiled.

Three paths to be unsealed at our behest. Whither shall we wander?
You thought to go down this path as well? How reassuring!
Interested in a different path? I shall place my trust in your intuition.
A grand gate. What lies beyond, I wonder?
I espy a most promising pagoda! Let us make it our destination.
What curious creatures! They must have been emboldened by these terrible torrents.
Mountain weather is wont to change on a whim, but 'tis not nature's whims at work here...
Thank the kami the rains have ceased... We should make for shelter ere another storm passes through.
Such tumultuous spirits! Servants of the wind, no doubt.
These winds could blow a man away...and will, if we do not tread carefully!
A thousand thousand paths...and yours ends here.
Fill your lungs!
Dying embers are easily snuffed...
We are everything and nothing─your first and final breath!
Choke in your graves!
Slayer of spirits... Their fate will soon be yours!
Your soul is mine to claim! Your marrow, mine to burn...
These treasures are mine! All <var 1A 02 /var>mine<var 1A 01 /var>! You shall not sully their brilliance!
The head monk, I take it? And bearing a form befitting his proclivities...
火の神より賜りし力よ…… 琵琶の響きで、燃え立ち猛れ！
火の神より賜りし力よ…… 琵琶の音色で、分かれて増えよ！
Beware the biwa's melody, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It resounds with power...
専門外なので私にはさっぱりデスが、 アナタなら、演奏の違いもわかるのでは……？
A song to guide you to your grave!
Beads to bind the spirit's form... With these words, be reborn!
My blessings are your curse!
No mercy, no mercy!
Hee hee! You thought you were free of me!
Divine thunder, heed my call─bestow upon my biwa your tumultuous timbre!
My power will see you humbled!
A drink to fuel the fires of my fury!
Ahahaha! You are as nothing before my might!
Curses... The libations...!
You yet stand!?
No... My precious...treasures...
Divine fire, I beseech thee─cleanse the branded with blessed flame!
Divine thunder, heed my call─sound to rend the very earth!
There is no salvation for thieves... I offer you death, and nothing more!
It shall be mine...mine, I say! You cannot have it!
The dance of a thousand petals begins with a single blossom!
Wayward flowers, bend to my will!
Spring has come!
Embrace ephemerality!
My shadow is my strength!
In summer's blaze do my blades sing... In winter's chill do they bite!
The sky weeps, and the earth heeds her call!
Death blooms in a raging tempest!
Come forth, dear friends, and beguile mine enemies!
Solitary leaves, I call upon you─fly at the mercy of the storm!
Reeds of the earth, take to the skies!
From accursed boughs do wicked buds bloom!
Under normal circumstances, I would find this ninjutsu endearing... Would that her petals did not seek to do us harm!
The blossoms must be enchanted. Keep a watchful eye on how they fly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
I should like to pat their fluffy little heads, but a well-trained pup will go to great lengths to protect its master...
Face me, and I shall grant you an honorable death!
My blade thirsts for mortal blood!
To me, my warriors! Your lord has need of you!
That my blade could miss its mark... You are a formidable foe.
In tenebrous night shall you meet your end...
In gardens of flame do true warriors thrive!
War is a sea of sorrow, and you shall drown!
My blade is inescapable!
My ire is an infernal flame, never to be smothered!
Our spirits are as the wind, never to be fettered!
To arms, my warriors! We make for the front lines!
I once dreamed of shaking hands with a giant oni, but not like this!
They may have strength in numbers, but worry not! If you cannot beat them, dodge them, I say!
Thank the kami the winds have ceased... We should make for shelter ere we are blown back to the foot of the mountain!
If I had to wager a guess, these must be the temple's stores. Rather spacious, aren't they?
Were I a treasure─cursed or no─I imagine I would abide within these walls. But where...
Under the auspices of two auspices, as it were. Curious.
So the glass serves as a magicked doorknob of sorts? The monks were certainly inventive...
You too are a connoisseur of Far Eastern maps, I trust? Terribly charming, how the Four Lords are shown ruling the cardinal directions.
I might have known that Suzaku and Seiryu were the guardians of this gateway─though in fairness, one usually needs grapple with only one at a time.
...Would that we had arrived sooner. Judging by her supernatural size, the demons have already taken that poor shinobi.
She must be in the thrall of a treasure. A promising lead...though at an unfortunate cost.
I see no clockwork mechanisms... We've an honest-to-kami mononoke on our hands.
The bloodlust is palpable... Have care, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I shall be right here─at a reasonably safe distance─cheering you on!
Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I knew from the first you would emerge victori─
...What, pray tell, is that look for?
Your faith in my faith in you aside, you may be interested to know that I recognize the detailing on this armor. It once belonged to a renowned warrior.
Would that my falcon had the freight capacity of a barge...
Alas, I suppose I must choose which artifacts to leave behind─for now.
Well done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Even the fiercest mononoke is no match for you!
'Tis difficult to appreciate while under threat of slicing and dicing, but the monks amassed a truly impressive collection of blades here.
To say naught of our most enspirited armor!
Perhaps the soul of the warrior who once wore it yet lingered, awaiting his chance to take to the battlefield once more...
Or perhaps his sword was a treasure with a life of its own.
A vexing conundrum─what to bring back to Kugane, that is. I don't suppose you've space in your bag...?
Well done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You are an unholy terror on the battlefield─and I mean that in the most flattering way.
To think that our secret passage would lead us to such an immaculate armory... Perhaps the monks utilized this as a shelter in times of strife.
I doubt they expected the armor they stored to come to life, however. Quite the harrowing foe, that one.
...Which leads me to believe that the armor itself must be one of the treasures we seek!
Despite its storied history, it looks almost pristine. I suspect the monks tended to it regularly.

It shall prove quite the challenge to bring back...but I daresay my falcon and I are up to the task! Pray accept my unending gratitude for your assistance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
A clash for the ages! Life-threatening circumstances aside, 'tis always a pleasure to witness bushido at work.
I had guessed the passage we traversed would lead us to the stores' most valuable contents─lo and behold!
Such exceptional relics are a rarity indeed...this armor not least of all.
The spirit that enlivened it may have been one of the very tsukumogami of rumor.
In an ideal world, I would not hesitate to bring home every last blade the mononoke touched... Alas, my falcon can only bear so much weight.
This calls for serious consideration... Pray leave me to my thoughts for a moment.
How pleasingly picturesque! Had we no demons to slay, I would suggest a more leisurely stroll.
I shudder to think of the chaos should those creatures find their way to civilization...
I suppose we're obliged to take the scenic route.
That ahead is Shojo Temple, home to Gorai and his accursed collection!
If only we had time for the typical ablutions... But a proper pilgrimage must wait for another day.
For now, treasure awaits! As do the monk and his minions, of course. Do have care.
I admit that I was equally tempted to pull that rope, though part of me wishes you hadn't...
The statues keep silent vigil in their masters' absence...but they are not the treasures we seek. Onward!
The temple stretches on ever further. Step lively, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We've plenty to explore.
Even the inner sanctum is plagued with demons. If any who remained did survive, 'twould be nothing short of a miracle.
Splendid as these statues are, they appear lacking in the “accursed” aspect. Our quarry must lie further in.
Though the temple's isolation is a blessing for the smallfolk, I imagine it made the monks' experience all the more harrowing...
We have yet to see hide nor hair of Gorai...
Breathtaking! 'Tis as though the majestic tiger it depicts might pounce off the screen at any─ Oh?
That was <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> an invitation! Your assistance, please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
That precarious pile of crates is a mountain unto itself!
Somehow, I doubt that brute has learned its lesson... But let us continue on.
By the kami, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how did you get up there?
Adventurers and their climbing... Why, just the other day, on Kugane Tower─ But perhaps that is a tale for another time.
That sounded promising... If you suddenly hear my winsome wailing, you had best come running!
Ah, a secret stairwell! How very convenient.
Both master and minion, irascible to the last...
Tokimori's words ring true. These creatures allow for not a modicum of mercy.
With your victory, we may now free the mountain of Gorai's influence─by liberating these treasures from his collection, of course.
Any one of them may have harbored spiritual forces. Perhaps all of them─it would certainly explain Gorai's impressive transformation.
As for which deserves a place in my collection... Gorai's biwa, of course! A fine addition.
And with that, we may be on our way. Your company has been a pleasure as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
And so the demon is slain!
Though his avarice availed him curious tools, your skill carried the day.
One wonders what artifacts he might have unveiled had you waited a touch longer to deal the killing blow...but there's naught to be done about it now.
Naught but to take the lesson of his life to heart, perhaps. Never shirk the proper appraisal of items with dubious histories!
Bearing this firmly in mind, I shall help myself to that hammer of his.
'Twas an honor and a privilege to accompany you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Shall we begin our preparations for the journey back?
Admirable as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Few would be so keen to face down a rat of that size.
To say naught of his unusual sousing. When the unholy draught touched his lips, I feared his fury would consume the entire temple.
I should like to know precisely what baleful influence was wrought upon the drink...but not enough to test it myself.
Nay, I must bring back a less volatile artifact of our endeavors...
The living lanterns─chochin, as the Hingans say─were particularly fascinating, were they not?
Now that they are returned to their original form, I may safely seek to learn more of the spirits they once harbored. Let us add them to my collection forthwith!
Curious... This lantern shines differently than the rest. The mononoke's influence, perhaps?
No, some other mechanism. What if I...
Lesson learned, Hancock─do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> prod eerily glowing objects!
In any case, the monks went to great pains to conceal this path. What could have warranted such secrecy?
Kami forfend! We could suffocate under this wicked haze...
I'd wager the tsukumogami is the pipe itself─its body a mere illusion.
A brilliant display! With the demonic smoke dispelled, we may breathe easy once more.
Only an entity of great power could transform its surrounds so dramatically. You did well to outmaneuver it.
Now, I espied something resting within the shrine earlier...
I have seen depictions of this pipe before. There can be no doubt that it is an age-old treasure.
Gorai must have known that a fierce tsukumogami slumbered within it. Thus he stored it apart, far from the sanctity of the temple...
But its will was too strong to be consigned to such ignominy, and in its neglect, its power only grew. Until it was strong enough to enshroud the mount entire...
Now that this lord among demons is slain, we can assume that peace shall return to the region. We must report the good news to Mistress Tsubaki posthaste!
I─and my growing collection─should not have fared half so well without you here. I am in your debt!
Shrink before my might! Quiver in awe!
A path straight up the holy mount, is it? How refreshingly dangerous!
Why, these hills stretch on for malms! Would that they were not alive with the sound of demons.
The Hingans call these clay figures “dogu”─but why is one here, of all places?
Best to let sleeping dogu lie. For all we know, it could be cursed.
If that dogu turns on us, its extermination shall be <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> responsibility, I hope you know!
Fallen leaves and fresh greenery in such close proximity? 'Tis passing strange.
There are few things more breathtaking than autumnal leaves...even if they are out of season. The influence of a treasure, I suspect.
I understand you adventurers enjoy the roads less traveled, but─ And there <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> goes. Courage, Hancock!
Such a tranquil place, these mountain heights. By the look of it, I presume it is not a path that many tread.
Hmm... 'Tis not the first of those stones we've encountered. Do they serve as shrines of some sort?
No shrine is built without purpose...or so I have heard. If such is the case, then what might this one be for?
Oho! I knew from the first that the dogu was meant for something greater.
I, for one, have <var 1A 02 /var>naught but respect<var 1A 01 /var> for our new clay comrade! ...Do you think it can hear us?
The warding talismans on this boulder give me pause...but it shall serve as well as any bridge, I suppose.
One cannot go wrong with a rustic log bridge─assuming the trunk is free of angry spirits, of course...
Gods be good! I know not how, but the statue has awakened...and it did <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> wake on the right side of the proverbial bed!
Just a moment─I have read of this before! If I am not mistaken, that mononoke is Shishio, king among nue!
Even a king of beasts is no match for you, I see! Well done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
The most, in a word, <var 1A 02 /var>vivid<var 1A 01 /var> Shishio myth tells of its ravenous rampage across the countryside. It had quite the appetite for mortal flesh!
'Tis also said that its harrowing cry is a harbinger of misfortune, but I say we should consider ourselves lucky to have chanced upon a living legend.
As for what freed it of its lithic bonds... Perhaps the revelry of its fellow mononoke roused its fighting spirit.
Alas, the beast held no treasures of Gorai's, but fret not─I shall make do with what we have here and claim a suitable souvenir.
Though our hike was fraught with peril, 'twas exhilarating in equal measure! You have my thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
A deed fit for legend! Quite literally, for Shishio appears in countless Hingan myths.
One, in fact, tells of a wayfaring warrior who triumphed over it long ago.
As such, I was aware that its harrowing cry could warp the very earth...but to see it firsthand is a wholly different beast, I'm sure you agree.
Though the creature bore none of Gorai's treasures, we can take comfort in the knowledge that it will terrorize Lord Uzumibi's people no more.
...And in the no less valuable artifacts we've spotted over the course of our journey to the summit, naturally.
All that remains is to carry the spoils to our waiting falcons. I trust I can count on you?
That is one mononoke felled─though if the legends are to be believed, Shishio is a wholly different beast than its tsukumogami brethren.
It came to the mountain long before Gorai's time─was sealed here by the very founder of Shojo Temple, in fact.
'Tis enough to make one wonder if that boulder we felled did not possess some greater significance...
But let us turn from that dark path, and instead appreciate the sacred scenery before us! Breathtaking, is it not?
...Do let me know if you spy any artifacts of value. I should like something to commemorate this trek.
You, of course, must have my sincerest thanks for making the perilous climb!
A harrowing display! Such ferocity have I rarely seen!
And Shishio was quite fearsome as well. It puts me in the mind of the Western chimera.
Yet of all that I have seen today, I am most taken with the dogu. I admit, I had my doubts...but to restore life to nature is no common feat.
I should like to take it back to Kugane. On the off chance it is sentient, we must hope it sees fit to forgive my earlier misgivings.
Our risks thus far have paid fine dividends, and I have you to thank for it. You have my utmost gratitude, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
You have done well to forestall your fate... But your end is come!
The chorus of steel rings eternal!
Mark where the armor readies its blade─though it has quite a reach, it cannot strike everywhere at once!
Could this be an accursed treasure, I wonder? That blade in the box we encountered was rather suspicious as well...
A sorry attempt at an ambush, if you ask me...but let us continue on.
